resources.string: Allows a developer to send commands via the Android Debug Bridge to have precise control of Android accessibility controls, such as focus and volume. You need to have developer settings enabled, and know how to use broadcasts with Android and the Android Debug Bridge.
Run\nadb shell settings put secure enabled_accessibility_services [service1]:[service2]

The service allows developers to use the Android Debug Bridge to control accessibility actions for testing and automation purposes. It provides a BroadcastReceiver to which developers can send instructions for accessibility navigation

Why not use a keyboard with switch access?

Because then I can't debug apps, and if I do wireless debugging, I drain the battery, and w/less debugging is not exactly consistent.
